When someone calls your language sexist and blocks you, but uses the language the exact same way themselves.… https://t.co/0QTbcXSR5k
@bouncingbrick @WillHearYou @Spacekatgal @functiontelechy I wasn't rude. Brianna uses 'guys' in a gender neutral way herself. But blocked.
@WillHearYou @bouncingbrick @Spacekatgal @functiontelechy Wow she blocked me, and she uses 'guys' that way herself. https://t.co/tQtRW64ubi
@stevebiddle yes you're infringing the rights holder, it is an illegal download.
@stevebiddle vpn? that's not really worth the pain.
@stevebiddle that's still piracy, and Netflix has shut that method down.
@Spacekatgal @functiontelechy that's your choice. Language evolves, I think you're in the minority.
@Spacekatgal @functiontelechy context matters, 'guys' isn't gender neutral, but I say 'hey guys' to my daughters and its intent is neutral.
@paulg @pkedrosky Steven Pinker doesn't have children, so I'm choosing to be confused about what he really thinks.
